      class  AbstractSetBalancer<Z,D extends Database<Z>>

    • Uses of AbstractBalancer in net.sf.hajdbc.balancer.load

      Subclasses of AbstractBalancer in net.sf.hajdbc.balancer.load 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LoadBalancer<Z,D extends Database<Z>>
      Balancer implementation whose LoadBalancer.next() implementation returns the database with the least load.

    • Uses of AbstractBalancer in net.sf.hajdbc.balancer.random

      Subclasses of AbstractBalancer in net.sf.hajdbc.balancer.random 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RandomBalancer<P,D extends Database<P>>
      Balancer implementation whose RandomBalancer.next() implementation returns a random database.

    • Uses of AbstractBalancer in net.sf.hajdbc.balancer.roundrobin

      Subclasses of AbstractBalancer in net.sf.hajdbc.balancer.roundrobin 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RoundRobinBalancer<P,D extends Database<P>>
      Balancer implementation whose RoundRobinBalancer.next() implementation uses a circular FIFO queue.

    • Uses of AbstractBalancer in net.sf.hajdbc.balancer.simple

      Subclasses of AbstractBalancer in net.sf.hajdbc.balancer.simple 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SimpleBalancer<Z,D extends Database<Z>>
      Trivial balancer implementation whose SimpleBalancer.next() implementation always returns the database with the highest weight.
